Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Adam "Adam"
Reviews.Content: The iPhone is simple to use and works great.  Plus this model doesn't have the lightning adapter which seems to be more trouble than it's worth (cables cost twice as much, video and audio out are limited compared to the 30 pin, and aftermarket products can be difficult to come by).

Reviews.Title: Great Used phone
Reviews.Author: Daoud Tafawa Balewa
Reviews.Content: This phone came UNLOCKED,,, JUST ADDED NEW SIMM AND AWAY I WENT. DID NOT HAVE TO RECONFIGURE ANYTHING. WORKED GREAT RIGHT OUT OF THE BOX.!

Reviews.Title: The cell phone is good!
Reviews.Author: Luckykobe
Reviews.Content: The cell phone is a white iphone 4s,but amazon gives me a black earphone.Furthermore I cann't activate the cell phone with SIM card of other carrier.But Sheetal(a staff of service department) help me to solve the problem.He is a good man.

Reviews.Title: screwed.
Reviews.Author: Bree
Reviews.Content: It clearly say I ordered a At&t; iPhone 4s but i received a Verizon locked iPhone 4s so I really got screwed out of about 220$.

Reviews.Title: Looks as good as new.
Reviews.Author: Joseph P. Fogg
Reviews.Content: Looks as good as new. Works great. Battery may not be as good as a new one, but is still a good battery. Just not quite as good as new. I have two other 4s's to compare.

Reviews.Title: Excellent.
Reviews.Author: Muhammed R.
Reviews.Content: It's work like new. It's looks new. Excellent . I love it .its come on time.also was las money. Very good.

Reviews.Title: I upgraded from iPhone 4 in late 2013 - WORTH it
Reviews.Author: L.Gildart
Reviews.Content: Buying a used iPhone, the seller matters. Do not just look at the price. Read the description and check the sellers' feedback scores. A lot of the reviews you see for the phone are actually seller feedback, which is not what I am here to do.I just bought a used iPhone 4S here in the Amazon Marketplace, and I love it. It runs all of the features I need from iOS 7, including the moving wallpaper (well, okay, maybe I don't NEED that). Performance is excellent, with a noticeable bump over my iPhone 4, which is also running iOS 7 quite nicely without the moving wallpaper. This is the first version of the iPhone that had Siri, and I'm surprised to find that I am using that feature quite a bit.There is also a bump in network speed over the iPhone 4. Is it worth it to upgrade to a 4S from a 4 at this point? For me, yes. I use T-Mobile and wasn't on board with signing a new contract to get a 5C or a 5S. This works fine for me - I use it as a phone, a text messenger, a lo fi point and shoot camera, iPod, and e-reader. It does all of these without a hiccup, and I don't owe anyone any money.

Reviews.Title: Like new
Reviews.Author: John Lloyd "John Lloyd"
Reviews.Content: My family purchased several of these directly from amazon because Amazon offers a 30 day return policy. Careful!, the other sellers may not allow returns.  They all arrived in near new condition.  Small dirt/fuzz in speaker and charging ports. Arrived in new boxes with new accesories and new instruction.  All worked like new.  All already out of Apple warranty.  Had all unlocked on ebay for $1.99 each. Now works fine on T mobile.  Seems to data stream fast enough.  I was worried because I heard that seconarily unlocked phones dont data stream as fast as phones made specifically for T mobile purchased directly from Tmobile or Apple.

Reviews.Title: starsIt is good!
Reviews.Author: lanc
Reviews.Content: I got a 64G iphone which i haven't think of how to use...with such a huge PhoneIt's great for me to have a unlocked phone now.

Reviews.Title: excellent seller
Reviews.Author: Rommel Medina
Reviews.Content: too good this article made me missing because I needed a computer with these features to further work that is fun and practical recommend it for all people

Reviews.Title: Very good quality!
Reviews.Author: Leah Agcaoili "Camille A."
Reviews.Content: Excellent product! It was more than I expected. Works perfectly and smoothly. It also arrived earlier than expected. I really like it. It's awesome :)

Reviews.Title: IPhone 4S great deal
Reviews.Author: Pauline Brickey
Reviews.Content: My iPhone 4S arrived on time brand new in orginal packaging ear buds and charging system included I have no issues at all quite happy with the phone and the coat I paid for it

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Nikki Heister
Reviews.Content: Got just what I was looking for. Loved the price, very happy with my purchase of the I phone 4s.

Reviews.Title: Perfect iPhone!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Davison
Reviews.Content: This phone was in absolutely perfect condition, all of the additional accessories were included in pristine condition as well. Highly reccomend this product to everyone, couldnt be more satisfied.

Reviews.Title: A Very Good Deal...Thank God!
Reviews.Author: James Maxwell
Reviews.Content: The phone was, as advertized, in excellent condition, like a new phone. This was a very good deal. Thank God!

Reviews.Title: This was the best used iphone i could find!! It came in a right shape and no scratches. I love it
Reviews.Author: lijian
Reviews.Content: This was the best used iphone i could find!! It came in a right shape and no scratches. I love it

Reviews.Title: Apple iPhone 4S 32GB (White) - AT&T;
Reviews.Author: zhang tingbo
Reviews.Content: Apple iPhone 4S 32GB (White) - AT&T;  -Like new.When I got the phone first time, I found the accessory headphone wire was bent, but test the function OK. I have used it for 2 months, the IOS 7 system is very reliable.No big scratch was found on the Cell phone.

Reviews.Author: Tom Lin
Reviews.Content: Not activated when received.Some scratches are on the back and border.Great felling of using.Easy to upgrade ios.

Reviews.Title: it was like new
Reviews.Author: Anil
Reviews.Content: i liked it very much, battery was not lasting like a new one but still i got a deal... :)

Reviews.Title: Excellent. thanks
Reviews.Author: Hernan Osorio
Reviews.Content: excellent purchase, really came as a new cell.I hope that future purchases are so good. and as new products

Reviews.Title: Solid phone - great condition

Reviews.Content: Very minor blemishes. Arrived when expected. Included the ear buds in original case. Worked out of the box with Straight Talk. Solid deal!

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4S 32GB
Reviews.Author: Selina
Reviews.Content: Works great!!!! I would recommend this company to anybody for purchases they make! I have no problems at all with this phone!

Reviews.Title: Could be a great iPhone 4S
Reviews.Author: Stephen
Reviews.Content: A used phone with a poor battery and no accessories earns it 2 stars.Otherwise, an iPhone 4S is an iPhone 4S so its a great build and a very great OS in it.One nice feature is the ability to have reminders go off based on a geographic location; its great on that.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPhone 4S - Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical at first on buying an iPhone since I was an Android fan.I love my iPhone, it came in perfect condition, & brand NEW!Also, it came to my house in exactly 4 days, just like they said it would!I am now an iPhone lover!

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Doris Zhang
Reviews.Content: Every penny of it. I want a like new 4s. With this low price, it's really impossible to get what I want. I tried it twice, and sent them back.

Reviews.Title: I phone 4S 32 GB
Reviews.Author: Moonhaven
Reviews.Content: Wish it had a back button for each screen. Other than that, I love it! It is very fast and I like the capacity.

Reviews.Title: Not as advertised, it came locked....
Reviews.Author: Jean F Tannoux M
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to use it in Venezuela, it came locked to be used only with AT&T; "Not as Advertised"

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Z. Williams "Deal scavenger"
Reviews.Content: Love the phone, hate the company. Apple is a bloodsucking company and its sad. Stop making so many phones and just put great technology in 1 phone that won't be outdated in 6 months. Ffs

Reviews.Title: Poor Customer Service and Disappointing Product
Reviews.Author: JareBear32
Reviews.Content: I have been apart of the Apple family since the beginning of college. In addition, my family has really enjoyed Apple's macs, Ipads, and Iphones. However regrettably, I am taking a leave of absence from the Apple family after being treated so poorly by their associates and investing hundreds of dollars in a malfunctioning product. I have sent two messages to Apple corporate with no response. In addition, my experience at the Apple store was very much disappointing. Their associates were not helpful nor were they sympathetic to my situation. I was told that my malfunctioning Iphone could not be traded in since my product was one month over warranty. My broken Iphone which was confirmed by three individuals(AT and T, third party, and Apple associate) to have no water or dropping damage was deemed unworthy of a trade in or replacement. The associates said that this happens and they could not replace my lemon. When investing into an Iphone, I was told that my phone would be technologically and environmentally superior to other phones. On Apple's website, their products are advertised as being environmentally friendly, well designed, and technologically powerful machines. My experience has been quite the opposite. I do not wish to invest hundreds of dollars for a product that damages the environment, malfunctions, and has a poor support team. After my disappointing experience at their store, I visited a corporate AT and T store who deemed my Iphone to be worth a $200 trade in. I was quite confused since the Apple associate stated that my product was worth nothing. Apple, a billion dollar corporation, is more concerned about money then they are about customer satisfaction. Apple has forgotten that they are creating a product for people not making a product for themselves. After this experience, I will think twice before investing into another apple product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone
Reviews.Author: truong
Reviews.Content: Overall, I think that this is a good phone. I can't compare this against any of the other phone available today.

Reviews.Title: Apple, we need a more open iOS
Reviews.Author: R V
Reviews.Content: This is an excelent product. The reason i took two stars away because of how apple has spent so much time and energy fighting jailbreaking. if they would only provide half the seriously useful tweaks that the Cydia store does, I would not jailbreak. As of now im lucky to be on iOS 5.1.1 since I can jailbreak and use the tweaks Ive bought. i will not upgrade to the iPhone 5 since it cannot be jailbroken and iOS is lacking many features that ive come to rely on that Cydia provides.Ive used the iPhone since its second iteration 93G) and have upgraded religiously every time Apple has released a new one. But, Im seriously considering switching to an Android phone for my next smartphone if jailbreaking continues to get more difficult.

Reviews.Title: APPLE FAN??
Reviews.Author: M. Cornish
Reviews.Content: Well what can I say except the iPhone is the top of the line cell phone for me!!!  I have had an iPhone since the first day it launched.  Great phone and easy to use.  My husband was anti-apple but has since changed his tune since receiving his iPhone 4s - let's just say he will not be turning back now!

Reviews.Title: this iphone looks good, but headphone is a cheap copy
Reviews.Author: JERRYC JBJF
Reviews.Content: this iphone looks good, but headphone is a cheap copy. i like this iphone, but i hate this headphone. anyway headphone is not too necessary for me

Reviews.Title: Will Never Buy from Amazon Warehouse Deals Again
Reviews.Author: Julia Schwager
Reviews.Content: If you are considering buying a phone from Amazon Warehouse Deals, reconsider. I ordered an iPhone 4s that was considered 'like new.'Their definition of a 'like new' product is:  A "like new"" item sold on Amazon Warehouse Deals is in perfect condition, but due to the condition of the packaging, it does not meet Amazon.com standards for new product. For customer-returned product, it's possible that the previous customer opened and removed the product from the original packaging. If a returned item comes back in perfect physical condition and through our testing process we determine the working condition is perfect, the item may be deemed "like new." Physical damage to the outer box of a factory-sealed item in our warehouse can also lead to the condition being taken from Amazon.com "new" to Amazon Warehouse Deals "like new."My iPhone arrived in the mail and I took it in to the AT&T; store to get it set up. Right away the employee who was working with me told me that my phone was damaged. The home button is wobbly and loose and when you talk on the phone with someone the quality of sound is terrible--I was told it already has a blown speaker. I would not consider this phone in "perfect working condition" at all. This leads me to believe that Amazon either tested the phone and still sold it as "Like New" while knowing full well that the phone had issues, or it was an oversight on their part. Either way, very disappointing purchase. I will not be buying from Amazon Warehouse Deals again, and it makes me rethink making purchases from Amazon in the future.

Reviews.Title: Awful!
Reviews.Author: Monse
Reviews.Content: One of the buttons wasn't working. It was obvious since the minute I opened the box.I did contact the sender, and he did offer to send another, but he didn't want to pay for me returning the item.This was so unfair! because it wasn't my fault.I don't want to deal with someone like this again.Send the thing back and I end up with less money in my pocket!

Reviews.Title: Dishonest
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Medeiros
Reviews.Content: I bought a BRAND NEW Iphone 4s 32gb about a week ago, I just received it in the mail a few days ago. I looked at it, looked into the ports (charging ports and head phone port), There was dirt within it, it was all warn down. On the site it said they had new ones they sent me a refurbished phone. My receipt said it was a brand new phone still in the original packaging. I would not recommend ANYONE to buy from this buyer they are scamming everyone selling used phones for the price of a brand new one.

Reviews.Title: iphone 4s
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Truby
Reviews.Content: Replacement for an iphone apple refused to look at for warranty issues due to a after market installed non original OEM part. Ridiculous, beware of apples warranty policy. Otherwise I love the iphone

Reviews.Title: I didn't like it
Reviews.Author: fernando
Reviews.Content: I bought that iphone as my first iphone ever. The very first days of use it works normally, then starts the problems... it shuts down repently and I did lose the information no saved.Finally someone stole my iphone, I only had it for two weeks! I try to trace my iphone with the software "Find my iphone" but it dont work, and I was sure of activate that program and sign me up in icloud. Im in Peru now, (I live here) and want my money back!!

Reviews.Title: Blown Speakers
Reviews.Author: Chandell Ching
Reviews.Content: I purchased this device several weeks ago, thinking I would receive a phone in good condition. Instead, the speakers were blown out, and the seller never mentioned the speakers being unusable. I can only call people using headphones, and I can't listen to music without my headphones being plugged in. In order to get this fixed, I would have to pay Apple $200, because she already used out the warranty. I highly recommend that you don't buy any products from this seller, due to false advertisement. Overall, I am very disappointed with my IPhone4s.

Reviews.Title: it's very good
Reviews.Author: flyingbird
Reviews.Content: the telephone looks new, it's the same as describe.but the charger is very old, which I don't like.I will recommend it to my friend if they like my telephone.

Reviews.Title: missing key to open the sim
Reviews.Author: Lizzie in Cebu
Reviews.Content: Disappointing that you are not informed of what is missing to properly decide whether it is a deal breaker. It did not make it any better to be told that a paperclip tip can do the trick..I did not buy the item wit using a paperclip in mind because I could have opted for other choices so the point is I should make an informed decision. my son was leaving for abroad in 2 days when it came so returning it was not going to work.

Reviews.Title: Dishonesty
Reviews.Author: Joey Roberts
Reviews.Content: I love Apple products, LOVE the iPhone.... But hate when online sellers choose to lie and be dishonest about lies after the costumer has already received the product. It is NOT fair when someone is receiving $400 easily by selling a USED phone.
